Blade - Interface in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades
A blade is an object with state operated on by requests within the thread context of a single reactor.

BlockingBlade - Interface in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades
Blocking blades are used to perform I/O or long computations.
BlockingBladeBase - Class in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades
A blocking blade performs long computations, I/O or otherwise may block the thread.

BlockingReactor - Class in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors
